We are a full service

Creative
Marketing Agency

Marketing doctor is a full-service, creatively driven marketing agency based in Toronto. We specialize in Web Design and Development, SEO, Digital Marketing, Social Media, Email Marketing, Multipurpose Self-Service Kiosk and Content Marketing.

Learn More

What we do

Marketing doctor offers a wide range of services and skill sets to an equally diverse range of clients on an international, national, and regional level. Our experience and industry insight has led to the agency becoming a key partner in our client’s businesses. And ultimately, their success.

,
k

UX Research

We implement the latest methodologies and technologies in design. Our designers are experienced in all digital platforms and social media, updated with the latest in our tech driven‑world.



Brand Identity

We specialize in building businesses’ brand identities, strategizing their marketing campaigns and maintaining them afterwards. This includes logo design and website development, product packaging, business cards, and email campaigns.



Web Design and Development

We are creative, resourceful and detail-oriented problem solvers. We design and develop websites for all types of organizations, including; real estate, retail, commercial and more.

,


Business Strategy

We help build your businesses’ platform to attract customers, compete successfully, strengthen performance, and achieve organizational goals.



Kiosk, Touchscreen and Digital Displays

We also specialize in building self-service kiosks, touchscreens and digital displays for retail, real estate and other markets.



Photography, Video and Content Production

We also help businesses with photography, video and content production. We have a hardworking team who specializes in producing and managing marketing content.

,

Generating New Ideas. Solving Big Problems

We specialize in paid digital advertising, digital marketing, web development, SEO/SEM, creative content and brand optimization. We leverage strategic thinking and emerging technologies to provide our clients with results measurable to their bottom line. Our team of in-house experts and partners have extensive backgrounds in building successful marketing campaigns across multiple industries.

Why we are different

The immediate benefit in working with Marketing Doctor is having a centralized agency that allows you to capitalize on a true omnichannel approach. We are a team of big picture critical thinkers who are also adept at execution. Our services are personalized to your company’s vision and aligned with needs of your customers. We understand how consumers interact with technology and utilizing real-time online engagement metrics allows us to succeed in today’s evolving marketing landscape.
